text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Apex Legends, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II GL704GM-DH74 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The build material is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II GL704GM-DH74 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II GL704GM-DH74 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The build material is also top-notch. Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the ASUS ROG Strix SCAR II GL704GM-DH74 17.3" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
